text: Xerocomellus dryophilus, formerly known as Boletus dryophilus or Xerocomus dryophilus, is a mushroom in the family Boletaceae native to North America. It was transferred to the new genus Xerocomellus in 2014. ==References== * Category:Boletaceae Category:Fungi of North America Category:Fungi described in 1975
title: Xerocomellus dryophilus
